select.label: Select a pricing model

select.noSelectedDefaultWillApply: No pricing model has been selected; default pricing will be applied.

details.title: {{pricingModelName}} details
details.forBothVerifiedAndUnverified: For both verified and unverified deals

fallBackToDefaultPricing.isDisabled: Fall back to default pricing model : Disabled
fallBackToDefaultPricing.isEnabled: Fall back to default pricing model : Enabled
fallBackToDefaultPricing.notApplicable: Fall back to default pricing model : Not applicable

error.isClientNotExistingOrNotAllowed: The client does not exist or this action is not available.
error.ERR_DEFAULT_ACCEPTANCE_LOGIC_NOT_FOUND: The default storage "Acceptance logic" cannot be found. Set an acceptance logic as default and try again or contact the CIDgravity team.
error.ERR_DEFAULT_PRICING_MODEL_NOT_FOUND: The default storage "Pricing model" cannot be found. Set a pricing model as default and try again or contact the CIDgravity team.
error.ERR_CHECK_ADDRESS_FROM_HISTORY: This address is invalid or does not exist on chain.
error.ERR_ADDRESS_ALREADY_USED_FROM_HISTORY: This address is already attached to an existing client.

validation.isGenericErrorWhileAddingClient: An error has occurred adding the client.
validation.isAddressOrPeerIdFieldMandatory: At least one Filecoin address or Peer ID is required.
validation.isClientNameAlreadyUsed: This client name is already in use.
validation.isStorageAcceptanceLogicSelectionMandato: You must select the acceptance logic to be associated with this client.

error.isAddressResolvesToAlreadyUsed: {{address}} resolves to {{resolvedAddress}} which is already in use.
error.isAddressNotOfTypeAccount: {{address}} is not a Filecoin supported actor type (f1 / f3 / f4).
error.isAddressGenericError: {{address}} cannot be added, please try again later or contact the CIDgravity team.
error.isAddressInvalidFilecoinFormat: {{address}} is not a valid Filecoin address
error.isAddressInvalidFormat: {{address}} - this address type is not supported, use SECP256K1, ID or BLS address
error.isPeerIdInvalidFormat: {{peerId}} is not a valid Peer ID.
error.isAddressBlacklisted: {{address}} is blacklisted, please whitelist it before associating it with a client.
